paragraphs.text: Developed a platform that connects users with independent contractors who assist with various tasks, jobs, and errands via a mobile application built with React Native and Spring Boot.
Implemented features allowing users to create tasks by specifying categories, descriptions, addresses, and dates, while contractors can accept and complete tasks using React and Redux.
Led and mentored a team of three developers in building the mobile application in React Native and the RESTful API using Spring Boot.

Single-handily built an online store for a retail company using React, Redux, and Spring Boot, with a product catalog, shopping cart, user account management, order management, promotions and discounts, and interactive find store locations on the map feature.
Created an admin panel using React enabling administrators to manage user accounts, product catalogs, orders, stores, and promotions, while providing data visualizations for sales and order insights.
Automated the shipping process by integrating with a third-party shipment system, reducing shipment delays and cutting shipment costs by 15%.
Created RESTful API with 8 microservices for a sales rep order management mobile application using Spring Cloud Discovery, Spring Cloud Config, Spring Cloud Gateway, and OAuth by Keycloak.
Created an admin web application in React and Ant Design for managing user accounts, products, promotions, stores, orders, and daily tasks of sales reps.
Developed a sales rep order management mobile application in Flutter and GetX, reducing sales process time by 30%.

Developed online payment modules for intra-bank, ACH, and SWIFT transactions in web and mobile banking applications using React, React Native, and Redux reducing payment processing time by 15% for over 1.5 million customers.
Collaborated with a DevOps team to build CI/CD pipelines by containerizing microservices using Docker and measuring code coverage with SonarQube and JaCoCo.
Managed a team of 8 developers in developing microservices in Spring Boot and web applications in Angular.
Converted a banking system from monolithic to microservice architecture by developing document processing, task management, and transaction microservices with Spring Boot and Kafka.
Developed authentication, authorization, and banking teller modules for an Angular intranet system used in 500+ branches.
Improved document processing efficiency with a Spring Boot microservice and Angular web application, decreasing average customer service time by 20%.
Designed and developed web applications for music and sports streaming using AngularJS.
Developed RESTful APIs with Django REST Framework and integrated them with the Wowza video platform for on-demand services.
